page.shortlink: ux control properties custom control data bound control properties
page.description: The 'Control properties' property loads different settings depending on the type of Custom Control that is being edited. The [CustomControl], [StepIndicator], [StarRating], [AudioPlayer], [AudioRecorderAndPlayer], [IntegerValue], [VideoPlayer], and [VideoRecorderPlayer] controls all make use of the 'Control properties' property.
